column1: Ofcom Board, Content Board and Executive Committee (ExCo) Gifts and Hospitality Register October - December 2014
It is Ofcom's policy that all gifts greater than £10 should be donated to a charity of Ofcom's choice. The values listed for hospitality are for the total bill (i.e. the Ofcom colleague plus guest).
Meetings with proprietors, editors and senior media executives

This list sets out the Chief Executive’s meetings with senior media executives during the period 1 October to 31 December 2014.
This includes meetings with proprietors, senior executives and editors of media organisations for both newspapers and broadcast media. It does not include those meetings with journalists that ended up in interviews that appeared in the public domain, either in newspapers or magazines, or meetings with Ofcom licensees. It may also exclude some larger social events at which senior media executives may have been present.
